'''Ding Ding Ding!''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Teyvat Fishing Guide: Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to catch 100 fish successfully.

==Notes==
*The bonus fish caught using [[Thoma]]'s passive talent [[Snap and Swing]] do not count towards this total.
